meaning_str.bing:
n. 生产；产量；制造；制造过程
网络. 产品；制作；生产部

生产；产量；制造；制造过程

生产；制造；（对自然物的）加工；采集；产生；产量；（戏剧、电影、电视节目、唱片等的）制作；上映；上演；制作方式；<正式>出示；提供；<非正式>非常费力的事

1.en: It was the breakthrough in the Japanese auto industry that helped the company expand into the arena of passenger car production.
1.cn: 它是日本汽车业的革新，促使该公司拓展其产业涉足驾乘汽车制造。

2.en: She adds: "So far the production figures are not as good as the beginning of year but still higher than last season. "
2.cn: 她补充称：“目前的产量数据没有年初那么好，但仍高于上一季。”

3.en: At the time when the degree of production socialization is improving, the social consumption tends to be relative dispersive.
3.cn: 在生产社会化程度提高的同时，社会消费却呈相对分散的趋势。

0.en: Will it affect food production, and so on?
0.cn: 以及这是否会影响到粮食生产，诸如此类。

1.en: And the true scale of production is revealed from the air.
1.cn: 从空中鸟瞰，便可得见这生产的真是规模。

2.en: Russian companies would oversee production and get a slice of the revenues.
2.cn: 俄国企业会监督生产，获取一小部分收益。

3.en: No, but it's close. Look at the markings inside. Those are production markings.
3.cn: 没错，但差不多。看里面的标记，那是生产标记。

4.en: But the production of oxygen is one of its key features.
4.cn: 但释放氧气无疑是其最核心特点之一。

5.en: Digital immunization chip. We were all ready to go into production next year.
5.cn: 数字免疫芯片，我们准备明年就投产。

6.en: Not to brag, but I could do a production of "12 Angry Men" starring cars. No, you don't, Taffy!
6.cn: 不是我显摆，但我收集的车都够拍《十二怒汉》汽车版了。不是吧你，太妃喵！

7.en: I thought it was cheesy, production value was low and the singers couldn't belt like Axl Rose or Mariah Carey.
7.cn: 我觉得这很差，没有产品价值，歌星也不能像艾克索·罗斯或者玛丽亚·凯莉一样放声大唱。

8.en: Great production value, sweetheart. I'm impressed. Can't believe I've got to go to work on Halloween. This blows!
8.cn: 水平很高嘛，亲爱的，了不起，难以置信，万圣节我还得上班，真讨厌。

9.en: All right, remember when I auditioned for that workshop production of rent, but I didn't get it and I couldn't figure out why.
9.cn: 是这样，记不记得我曾经参加了出租产品展示会的试镜，却没通过，并且我没想通是什么原因。

10.en: Which is a fantastic story, unless you think about humanity's footprint on the planet and our ability to keep up food production.
10.cn: 这是个神奇的故事，当然还有人类遍布全球的足迹和我们追赶粮食产量的能力。

11.en: China's movie market is now the world's second largest with tens of thousands of cinema screens, and home-grown production is booming.
11.cn: 中国的电影市场规模已跃居世界第二。伴随着成千上万块新增银幕，本地电影也蒸蒸日上。

12.en: Only the entire show of my high-school production of "The wiz," but I don't think that's... Oh, glass elevator. Should make for an exciting view.
12.cn: 我只在高中时偷了整场《绿野仙踪》表演的风头，不过我认为那不算是...观光电梯，可以看到绝美的风景了。

13.en: Anyway, after four years of acting lessons and waiting tables, I've done a hemorrhoid commercial and a production of Anne Frank above a bowling alley.
13.cn: 不过上了四年的表演课当了四年服务员之后，我出演了一个痔疮广告和一个保龄球球道上面扮演过安妮·弗兰克。

14.en: I have come to the National state TV broadcaster, China Central Television, on the day of their first dress rehearsal, to discover what goes into putting on such a huge production.
14.cn: 我前往中国国家电视台，中央电视台，这天是他们第一天带妆彩排，来看一下如此大制作究竟是为什么。

15.en: So, what's up? Well, Penny is on her way to perform in a one-night showcase production of rent, which we are unable to attend, because we're going to a symposium on molecular positronium given by Dr. Emil Farman Farmian.
15.cn: 怎么了？潘妮正要去一个出租用品展示会进行表演，而我们不能去了，因为我们要去参加由伊米尔·法尔曼法尔米安博士主讲的关于分子正负的研讨会。
